CustomField.formula:
IF(DATEVALUE(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c) >= DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c)), 3, 1) + (14 - CASE(MOD(DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c)), 3, 1) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, 7, MOD(DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c)), 3, 1) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7))) && DATEVALUE(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c) < DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c)), 11, 1) + ( 7 - CASE(MOD(DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c)), 11, 1) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, 7, MOD(DATE(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c)), 11, 1) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7)) ), /*Daylight saving ENDS*/ IF( VALUE(LPAD(MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 5 / 24), 12, 5), 2)) = 12, MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 5 / 24), 12, 5) + ' PM',
IF(VALUE(LPAD(MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 5 / 24), 12, 5), 2)) < 12, IF(VALUE(LPAD(MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 5 / 24), 12, 5), 2)) = 00, TEXT(12) + MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 5 / 24), 14, 3), IF(VALUE(LPAD(MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 5 / 24), 12, 5), 2)) < 10, MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 5 / 24), 13, 4), MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 5 / 24), 12, 5))) + ' AM', TEXT(VALUE(MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 5 / 24), 12, 2)) - 12) + MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 5 / 24), 14, 3) + ' PM')),
/*Daylight saving STARTS*/ IF( VALUE(LPAD(MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 6 / 24), 12, 5), 2)) = 12, MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 6 / 24), 12, 5) + ' PM',
IF(VALUE(LPAD(MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 6 / 24), 12, 5), 2)) < 12, IF(VALUE(LPAD(MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 6 / 24), 12, 5), 2)) = 00, TEXT(12) + MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 6 / 24), 14, 3), IF(VALUE(LPAD(MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 6 / 24), 12, 5), 2)) < 10, MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 6 / 24), 13, 4), MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 6 / 24), 12, 5))) + ' AM', TEXT(VALUE(MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 6 / 24), 12, 2)) - 12) + MID(TEXT(Event_Instance__r.Start_Date_Time__c - 6 / 24), 14, 3) + ' PM')) )
